LawyerSection.name: Carlos Alberto Rodríguez Gutiérrez
LawyerSection.title: Criminal Defense Attorney | Legal Advisor
LawyerSection.quote: Strategic defense, ethical counsel, and a commitment to justice.
LawyerSection.description: With over 25 years of experience serving justice and defending citizens' rights, I provide legal representation and advice in criminal, civil, labor, administrative, and corporate matters, supported by a high-level interdisciplinary team.

AboutSection.title: About Me
AboutSection.backgroundAlt: Background of the About Me section
AboutSection.imageAlt: Carlos Alberto Rodríguez in his office
AboutSection.paragraph1: I am an attorney with over two decades of experience in the practice of Colombian Criminal Law. My approach combines professional ethics, technical expertise, and a legal strategy tailored to each individual case.
AboutSection.paragraph2: I work alongside a multidisciplinary team of attorneys and forensic experts in various fields, which allows me to offer reliable, and high-level legal solutions to both individuals and corporate clients.
